org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.receive
Class AeSOAPReceiveHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.receive.AeAbstractReceiveHandler
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.receive.AeSOAPReceiveHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeBPELReceiveHandler, IAeReceiveHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeAxisReceiveHandler
public abstract class AeSOAPReceiveHandler
extends AeAbstractReceiveHandler

Abstract receive handler for handling input and output data as SOAPEnvelope documents

createWsResponse

protected AeInvokeResponse createWsResponse(IAeWebServiceResponse aResponse,
                                            javax.xml.soap.SOAPEnvelope aResponseEnv)
                                     throws AeBusinessProcessException
Creates a IAeWebServiceResponse from the BPEL engine response and a SOAPEnvelope The returned response will replace the AeMessageData from the engine with one that contains the SOAPEnvelope with a type of soapenv:Envelope and any attachments from the response.

Parameters:
aResponse -
aResponseEnv -
Returns:
the response
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

mapFaultData

public IAeWebServiceResponse mapFaultData(IAeExtendedMessageContext aContext,
                                          IAeWebServiceResponse aResponse)
                                   throws AeBusinessProcessException
Maps fault data from the BPEL engine to a SOAPEnvelope containing a Fault envelope. The message data within the response will have a type of soapenv:Envelope and a single element containing the SOAPEnvelope document.

Parameters:
aContext -
aResponse -
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException
